games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: Embark on an epic adventure in the vast kingdom of Hyrule, exploring wild lands and facing challenging dungeons to defeat Ganon and save the realm.

games.name: Super Mario Odyssey
games.description: Embark on a globe-trotting adventure with Mario as he sets out to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser's clutches, using his trusty hat, Cappy, to possess enemies and objects along the way.

games.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
games.description: Escape to a deserted island and create your own paradise as you craft, explore, and befriend adorable animal villagers in this relaxing life simulation game.

games.name: Mario Kart 8
games.description: Race against friends or AI opponents in this high-octane kart racing game featuring a variety of beloved Nintendo characters and exhilarating tracks.

games.name: Splatoon 2
games.description: Engage in colorful ink-based battles as you compete in turf wars and multiplayer matches against players from around the world.

games.name: Pokémon Sword and Shield
games.description: Embark on a journey to become the Champion of the Galar region, capturing and training Pokémon while uncovering the mysteries of the Dynamax phenomenon.

games.name: Fire Emblem: Three Houses
games.description: Lead your house of students at the Officer's Academy and guide them through tactical battles and personal relationships in a war-torn land.

games.name: Luigi's Mansion 3
games.description: Join Luigi as he braves the haunted halls of the Last Resort hotel to rescue his friends from the clutches of King Boo.

games.name: Xenoblade Chronicles 2
games.description: Embark on a journey across the backs of colossal Titans to discover the secrets of the world of Alrest and save it from destruction.

games.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
games.description: Battle it out with your favorite video game characters in this ultimate crossover fighting game featuring a vast roster and iconic stages.

games.name: Kirby and the Forgotten Land
games.description: Kirby finds himself in a mysterious world known as the Forgotten Land, which is filled with various environments ranging from lush forests to sandy beaches and even bustling cities.

games.name: Hollow Knight
games.description: Discover a vast, interconnected world filled with deadly foes and stunning landscapes in this highly anticipated sequel to Hollow Knight.

games.name: Astral Chain
games.description: Players control a special police task force member fighting against interdimensional invaders using a sentient weapon called the Legion.

games.name: Mario Party Superstars
games.description: Mario Party Superstars is a multiplayer party game for Nintendo Switch, featuring classic boards and minigames from previous Mario Party titles, updated with modern graphics and gameplay enhancements.

games.name: Metroid Return of Samus
games.description: Embark on an intense intergalactic mission as bounty hunter Samus Aran, confronting deadly enemies and uncovering the secrets of the mysterious X parasite.

games.name: Monster Hunter Rise
games.description: Join the hunt in this thrilling action RPG adventure, where you'll track down formidable monsters, forge powerful weapons, and explore a lush and dangerous world.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight princess
games.description: Soar through the skies and brave the dangers of the surface world in this HD remaster of the classic Wii adventure, now enhanced with improved controls and visuals.

games.name: Octopath Traveler
games.description: Embark on an epic journey across the vast continent of Orsterra, where eight travelers with their own unique abilities and stories intersect in a beautiful pixel art world.

games.name: Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze
games.description: Join Donkey Kong and his friends on a treacherous adventure to reclaim their island from the invading Snowmads in this challenging and beautifully crafted platformer.
